Flock Documentation

1.3.1

Flock of Birds portable API written by Atamai Inc: http://www.atamai.com

This library provides a set of C functions for communicating with the Flock of Birds six degree of freedom tracking device sold by Ascension Technology Corporation (http://www.ascension-tech.com/). The code has been tested on Windows NT, Windows 2000, Linux and SGI IRIX. It should work on any POSIX conformant operating system or any operating system that conforms to the Microsoft Windows 32-bit API.

All of the code in this library is original and does not contain any code from Ascension Tech.
